local_intent: Grasp the fridge handle using precomputed 'handle_grasp' after aligning, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: 'handle_grasp' has been computed and is available on the blackboard
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the GLOBAL_BT: visibility check, open gripper, align to fridge_handle, ensure handle_grasp pose available, execute Pick with timeout 1500, then verify with IsGraspStable.
